name: openfoam-cylinder
title: Cylinder Flow: Potential Flow Analysis
description: OpenFOAM simulation of incompressible potential flow around a circular cylinder with configurable Reynolds number, inlet velocity, and cylinder geometry.
content:
Overview

This application simulates incompressible potential flow around a circular cylinder using OpenFOAM computational fluid dynamics solver. The simulation uses the potentialFoam solver to compute steady-state flow patterns, velocity fields, and pressure distributions around the cylinder geometry.

Scientific Relevance

Understanding flow around cylinders is fundamental in fluid mechanics and has applications in aerodynamics, offshore engineering, and heat exchanger design. The potential flow solution provides insight into ideal fluid behavior and serves as a baseline for more complex viscous flow analysis.

Visualization

After simulation completion, run python analysis.py to visualize real OpenFOAM data with streamlines, or explore analysis/conceptual_animation.ipynb for conceptual flow animations.

Project Structure

openfoam/
├── run_openfoam.sh          # Main simulation runner
├── system/                   # OpenFOAM system files
│   ├── controlDict          # Simulation control parameters
│   ├── blockMeshDict        # Mesh generation definition
│   ├── fvSchemes            # Numerical schemes
│   └── fvSolution           # Solver settings
├── 0.orig/                   # Initial and boundary conditions
│   ├── U                    # Velocity field
│   └── p                    # Pressure field
├── output/                   # Simulation results
│   ├── VTK/                 # Visualization data
│   └── *.log                # Solver logs
├── analysis.py              # Main analysis script (PyVista)
└── analysis/                # Post-processing
    └── conceptual_animation.ipynb # Conceptual flow animation
command: cd ${simulationFolder} && rm -rf prod_apps && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && cp -r prod_apps/openfoam ./openfoam && rm -rf prod_apps && cd openfoam && ./run_openfoam.sh ${reynoldsNumber} ${inletVelocity} ${cylinderRadius}

jobConfig.description: Select the configuration for the job

spec.name: reynoldsNumber
spec.label: Reynolds Number
spec.description: Dimensionless Reynolds number characterizing the flow regime (1-1000). Controls the balance between inertial and viscous forces. Examples: 10 (creeping flow), 100 (moderate flow), 500 (high Re flow), 1000 (approaching turbulent). Default: 100.

spec.name: inletVelocity
spec.label: Inlet Velocity (m/s)
spec.description: Uniform inlet velocity magnitude in meters per second (0.1-5.0). Determines the flow speed approaching the cylinder. Examples: 0.5 (low speed), 1.0 (moderate), 2.0 (high speed), 5.0 (maximum). Default: 1.0.

spec.name: cylinderRadius
spec.label: Cylinder Radius (m)
spec.description: Radius of the circular cylinder in meters (0.1-2.0). Affects the flow obstruction and pressure distribution. Examples: 0.2 (small), 0.5 (standard), 1.0 (large), 2.0 (maximum). Default: 0.5.

spec.label: Simulation Folder
spec.name: simulationFolder
spec.description: Select the folder to store simulation scripts and output data; by default, this is the user's Stash root directory.
